      • load

        public static State load​(State state,
                         XMLEventReader xer)
                  throws XMLStreamException
        Read in the state from an even reader. Notes that this is used in cases where there is no workspace, such as in scripts, but there is a (possibly custom) state object that needs to be populated.
        Parameters:
        state -
        xer -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException
